assistant_id.title: Assistant Id
assistant_id.description: The assistant ID or graph name to filter by using exact match.

thread_id.title: Thread Id
thread_id.description: The thread ID to search for.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The number of results to skip.

select.title: Select
select.description: Specify which fields to return. If not provided, all fields are returned.
